column1: The '''Pass of Aglon''' (or just '''Aglon'''), also called the '''Gorge of Aglon'''<ref name=GA242/>, was the pass between [[Dorthonion]] and the uplands west of [[Himring]], to the north-east of [[Beleriand]].<ref>{{S

It was about six leagues in length, with the western side bordering the [[Dorthonion]] Plateau rising in very high steep walls. It was chilly since a bitter wind continuously blew through the pass from the lands to the north.<ref name="Beleriand">{{S

Two of the [[Sons of Fëanor]], [[Celegorm]] and [[Curufin]], heavily fortified this area, augmented by extra forces in [[Himlad]]. About ten leagues to the east, the pair's elder brother [[Maedhros]] had built upon the [[Hill of Himring]] his stronghold, thus protecting this weak point in the chain of kingdoms created by the [[Noldor]] after the [[Dagor-nuin-Giliath]] (Battle-under-Stars).<ref name="Beleriand"/>
